eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi

Class Api

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.Api
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class Api
extends org.restlet.Application
    RESTLET application that serves incoming calls for the Gateway API. After being instantialised, it initialises objects necessary to be available to all API services (like Communication Node). It routes the requests to their respective Resources. The HTTP authentication against Gateway API is also checked in the AuthenticationVerifier.
    Author:
    sulfo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Api

        public Api(org.apache.commons.configuration2.XMLConfiguration config,
           java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Constructor, initialises necessary objects and inserts the configuration, logger and CommunicationNode into the RESTLET context. All parameters are mandatory, failure to include them will lead to a swift end of application execution.
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration object.
        logger - Java logger.

      • createAuthenticator

        private org.restlet.security.ChallengeAuthenticator createAuthenticator()
        Returns an instance of ChallengeAuthenticator, that is able to authenticate requests against the XMPP network.
        Returns:
        A custom ChallengeAuthenticator.

      • configureChallengeScheme

        private void configureChallengeScheme()
        Translates the authentication method string from configuration file into RESTLET readable authentication scheme. If the string is not recognised as valid scheme, or if the configuration string says "none", null is returned.
